response:
Urgent neuroimaging is required to rule out surgical emergencies like cord compression from an abscess and to characterise the lesions. Comprehensive microbiological and immunological screening is essential to differentiate between infection and autoimmune inflammation given the high CRP.

investigations = ["MRI of Brain and Whole Spine with contrast", "Full blood count", "C-reactive protein", "Erythrocyte sedimentation rate", "Blood cultures", "Lumbar Puncture (CSF microscopy, culture, viral PCR, oligoclonal bands)", "Serum Aquaporin-4 antibodies", "Serum MOG antibodies", "Autoimmune screen (ANA, ANCA)", "HIV serology", "Echocardiogram"]
